gameview.sView

Class SState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameview.sView.SState

  • public class SState
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the top class for the "SState". Its the controlling unit. Every panel is created here and added to or removed from the mainframe. Also the events will be fired from this class.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.

    • Method Detail

      • getPGV

        public PlayerGameView getPGV()
        Getter for the PlayerGameView
        Returns:
        pGV the player gameView

      • initGameMode

        public void initGameMode()
        If the "New game" Button is pressed the "maplist" and the current map have to be loaded. This method is called before the GameMode panel is added to the Mainframe

      • mapSelected

        public void mapSelected(java.lang.Object source,
               java.lang.String mapName)
        This method fires a event if a map is chosen. With fired map title the map preview and the map informations can be shown.
        Parameters:
        source - Source of the event
        mapName - Name of the map

      • onPanePGameMode

        public void onPanePGameMode(boolean onPane)
        Remove or add one of the sView panels.
        Parameters:
        onPane - = true -> add; false -> remove

      • onPanePMenu

        public void onPanePMenu(boolean onPane)
        Remove or add one of the sView panels.
        Parameters:
        onPane - = true -> add; false -> remove

      • onPanePPlayerSetting

        public void onPanePPlayerSetting(boolean onPane)
        Remove or add one of the sView panels.
        Parameters:
        onPane - = true -> add; false -> remove

      • playerNumberSelect

        public void playerNumberSelect(java.lang.Object source,
                      int chosenNumber,
                      java.lang.Integer[] specialTicketArray)
        This method fires a event if the player number is changed. This could happen in the SMapSettingPanel
        Parameters:
        source - Source of the event
        chosenNumber - Number of choosen players
        specialTicketArray - Number of special ticket types

      • processEvent

        public void processEvent(IAEvent event)
        This method commits the events to every panel.
        Parameters:
        event - A event

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method fires the NewSwitchStateEvent and changes the current state to "Game_State_Play"
